Package me.hsgamer.hscore.downloader

Class Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.hsgamer.hscore.downloader.Downloader
  • public class Downloader
extends Object
    The downloader
    The format of the database: 
       
   {
     "name1": {
       "file-name": "name1.jar",
       "version": "1.0",
       "direct-link": "example.com/name1.jar",
       ...
     },
     "name2": {
       "file-name": "name2.jar",
       "version": "1.0-SN",
       "direct-link": "example.com/name2.jar",
       ...
     },
     ...
   }
